targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "router.versions" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$routerHost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (100 - mean("idle")) as cpu FROM "router.cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$routerHost$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

seriesOverrides.alias: Processor load (1 min average per core)

params: Processor load (1 min average per core)
Processor load (5 min average per core)
Processor load (15 min average per core)

panels.description:
-30 dBm 	Amazing 	
-67 dBm 	Very Good 	
-70 dBm 	Okay 	
-80 dBm 	Not Good 	
-90 dBm 	Unusable
panels.title: Wifi rssi

targets.query: SELECT "rsi_antenna_avg_1", "rsi_antenna_avg_2", "rsi_antenna_avg_3", "rsi_antenna_avg_4" FROM "router.wifi.clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'StefansiPhone2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "client"

SELECT "rsi_antenna_avg_1", "rsi_antenna_avg_2", "rsi_antenna_avg_3", "rsi_antenna_avg_4" FROM "router.wifi.clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'StefansiPhone2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "client"

SELECT "rsi_antenna_avg_1", "rsi_antenna_avg_2", "rsi_antenna_avg_3", "rsi_antenna_avg_4" FROM "router.wifi.clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'StefansiPhone2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "client"
SELECT "rx", "tx" FROM "router.traffic" WHERE ("mac" = '18:31:BF:53:F1:C2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mac", "cat_name"
SELECT "rx", "tx" FROM "router.traffic" WHERE ("mac" = '18:31:BF:53:F1:C2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mac", "cat_name"
SELECT "rx", "tx" FROM "router.traffic" WHERE ("mac" = '18:31:BF:53:F1:C2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mac", "cat_name"
SELECT "rx", "tx" FROM "router.traffic" WHERE ("mac" = '18:31:BF:53:F1:C2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mac", "cat_name"

SELECT moving_average("rsi_antenna1", 5), moving_average("rsi_antenna2", 5), moving_average("rsi_antenna3", 5), moving_average("rsi_antenna4", 5), moving_average("rssi", 20) FROM "router.wifi.clients" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$routerHostsWifi$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "client", "ip"

SELECT "rsi_antenna_avg_1", "rsi_antenna_avg_2", "rsi_antenna_avg_3", "rsi_antenna_avg_4" FROM "router.wifi.clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'StefansiPhone2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "client"

SELECT "rsi_antenna_avg_1", "rsi_antenna_avg_2", "rsi_antenna_avg_3", "rsi_antenna_avg_4" FROM "router.wifi.clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'StefansiPhone2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "client"

SELECT "rsi_antenna_avg_1", "rsi_antenna_avg_2", "rsi_antenna_avg_3", "rsi_antenna_avg_4" FROM "router.wifi.clients" WHERE ("hostname" = 'StefansiPhone2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "client"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "hostname" WHERE "wifi" =~ /eth./
